list.name: FX 1 Operational Mode Change
Commands
FX Aux Changes
MX Aux Change

description: The SolarThing dashboard that shows the status of the solar panels and batteries.

panels.description:
An average of devices able to give battery voltage readings.

If the voltage is below 23.0 V, this means the battery is low. If the voltage stays at or below 22.0 V for 2 minutes, the system will shutdown.
panels.title: Battery Voltage

panels.description: Shows temperature data for sensors connected to the SolarThing network.
panels.title: Temperature Data

targets.query: SELECT "pvCurrent" * "inputVoltage" FROM "solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'MXFM_STATUS') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier"
SELECT ("inverterCurrent" * "outputVoltage") + ("buyCurrent" - "chargerCurrent") * "inputVoltage" FROM "solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'FX_STATUS') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier"

panels.description:
This shows how much energy the solar panels have produced today. If the solar panels produced 1kW for 1 hour, that would be 1kWh.

For extremely sunny days with no clouds, we would usually get 14kWh.

targets.query: SELECT "dailyKWH" FROM "solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'MXFM_DAILY') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier"

panels.title: Daily kWH

targets.query: SELECT "pvCurrent" * "inputVoltage" FROM "solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'MXFM_STATUS') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier"

panels.description: The mode that each device is in

targets.query: SELECT "operatingModeName" FROM "normal_short_retention"."solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'FX_STATUS') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier" ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1

panels.title: Device Mode

targets.query: SELECT "pvCurrent" * "inputVoltage" FROM "solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'MXFM_STATUS') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier"
SELECT "dailyKWH" FROM "solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'MXFM_DAILY') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier"
SELECT ("inverterCurrent" * "outputVoltage") + ("buyCurrent" - "chargerCurrent") * "inputVoltage" FROM "solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'FX_STATUS') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier"
SELECT "chargerCurrent" * "inputVoltage" FROM "solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'FX_STATUS') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier"
SELECT "inverterCurrent" * "outputVoltage" FROM "solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'FX_STATUS') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier"
SELECT "buyCurrent" * "inputVoltage" FROM "solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'FX_STATUS') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier"
SELECT "chargerCurrent" * "batteryVoltage" FROM "solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'MXFM_STATUS') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier"
SELECT ("buyCurrent" - "chargerCurrent") * "inputVoltage" FROM "solarthing" WHERE ("packetType" = 'FX_STATUS') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "identifier"

targets.alias: AC Mode | 0: No AC | 1: AC Drop | 2: AC Use
targets.aliasBy: 0: No AC | 1: AC Drop | 2: AC Use

panels.title: AC Mode Graph (Is Generator on or off?)
